Cloud Koh

Introduction

The Volunteers (also known as TVT) is a three-member rock band that debuted under Blue Vinyl. They debuted on May 21, 2018, with the digital single "Violet". The first group formation consisted of Cloud, Yerin, Jonny, and Chiheon. They released their first full-length self-titled album on May 27th, 2021.

In February of 2024, Cloud posted a letter saying he was leaving the band.

On April 9th, 2024, the members left their previous label BLUEVINYL, leading to the shutting down of the label, and they have founded their own independent group/label, peoplelikepeople.
